Reviews.Title: GREAT STANDARD CANON ITEMS BUT POOR QUALITY ACCESSORIES
Reviews.Author: Stephen Spinner
Reviews.Content: This "HUGE" Canon Rebel T2i package has been reviewed elsewhere on Amazon (but with the 16Gig SDHC card vs. this 32GIG SDHC card), and I concurred that the standard accessories are excellent, but the Zeikos accessories added are pure junk!!! Aside from the 10 year warrantee for a rather shoddy looking Zeikos tripod, and the Transcend brand Class 4 32Gig SDHC (good mainly for only stills, not the camera's HD video function, to which I anticipated the need for a Sandisk Class 10 16Gig, and placed an order for this simultaneously from another one of Amazon's third party sellers). As stated elsewhere, the Macro/Wide Angle lense is crap; I needed the unscrewable Macro portion of the lense, which both distorted the image progressively towards the peripheral edges of the field of view, and created a nasty barrel effect. (Thank Heaven's for Photoshop's cropping feature, though I will likely just scrap its use and use the standard Canon zoom optics and avoid what also appeared to be a deteriorated image. I haven't used the Zeikos telephoto lense yet, and probably will net the same neglegible results vs. the Canon optics. I could not find the LCD protective plastic cover in the little camera maintenance pak, and would not chance the use of the ditzy little table tripod. I am informed the 3 supplied filters fall apart soon after use. The 2 additional battery packs are NOT Canon products, and I am informed yields fewer stills per full charge than the Canon OEM product. The Canon 55-255 zoom lense and, I believe, the standard Canon 18-55 zoom lense are both from Taiwan!  SINCE THIS REVIEW, SELLER HAS ATTEMPTED TO MAKE SOME ADJUSTMENT AND EXPLAINED AWAY MY WRONG ASSUMPTION OF OVERCHARGING FOR THESE ADDITIONAL ITEMS, SO I AM RECOMMENDING THE SELLER WITH 5 STARS, NOW!

Reviews.Title: The camera is perfect....the package is rubbish
Reviews.Author: O.George
Reviews.Content: Simply the camera is fantastic... but don't buy the package...it is full of rubbish....the macro lens, the 2X lens, the tripod, the flash and the case are all rubbish

Reviews.Title: All lenses are not Japan made
Reviews.Author: Luke Chang
Reviews.Content: The camera is made in Japan, a good one, thats about it.  Two lenses are made in Taiwan and Malaysia, all other additional items are made in China.  Lenses not made in Japan have lower quality, all China made stuff are junk, very crapy and usseless.  So what do I get from this vendor/package?  I probably saved a few bucks, but certainly did not get the quality that I expected.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera, bad acessories.
Reviews.Author: Denis Brandao
Reviews.Content: When I bought this pack, I was already aware that the items included was low quality. But they are very poor, some of them useless. The telephoto lens is so blurry that it is not usable. The flash is also unusable.The lens are from taiwan but i was already expecting that and they are worth the price.My most disappointing is that they changed the original Canon battery for a generic one. I know I was buying two generic batts, but I was expecting to get the Canon original that usually came with the camera. But I got 3 generic batts for each kit (Yeah I bought 2 kits, so i got 6 generic batteries).The filters, SD card and other stuff on the pack are all ok and work good as expected.

Reviews.Title: Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Gabriel M Martinez
Reviews.Content: Bought these accessories for my wife and she loves them.  She uses all the items in the kit.  I recommend this kit especially for beginners.

Reviews.Title: I love this kit!
Reviews.Author: Mrs.
Reviews.Content: I am attempting to start my photography business and with this kit I am well on my way! This is a great starter camera and its very easy to operate. The kit lens it comes with (18-55mm) is plastic, not glass, but the 55-250mm lens works perfect! All of the stuff that is included in the kit, especially the spare batteries, is definately a giant plus!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: rod taylor
Reviews.Content: The product I purchased is everything I hope it would be. I have purchased other items from Amazon.com and as always its a pleasure to do business with you.Thanks Rod Taylor

Reviews.Title: Great camera,Uncrediale quality!!!
Reviews.Author: givanildo dos santos
Reviews.Content: That's all I have to say: You can even start thinking  been a professional photographer. Because you have a great equipment , very sharp pictures for a little money comparedTo the other that I'd seen. No regret!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 2Ti Bundle
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital SLR camera so I have a lot to learn about the camera to obtain great pictures, however I am satisfied with the product, other then possibly the external flash which is of low quality.  Overall, I am pleased with my purchase and intend on owning for quite some time.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: RandyB
Reviews.Content: Got the camera package for Christmas and so far we have been happy with it except for the SD card that came in the bundle. In order to be able to take HD video in true HD you have to have a card with a rating of better than Class 6 and they only send it out with a Class 4. We are happy so far though with our limited abilities to take pictures but are looking forward to trying and learning many more new things.

Reviews.Title: t2i pack
Reviews.Author: ramjoe "joseph wesley"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT......GREAT QUALITY VIDEO.....720 and 1080 60 fps 30 fps on 720 and 30 or 24p on 1080....you should get it....i did

Reviews.Title: Decent combo for the price
Reviews.Author: Baker
Reviews.Content: Expected products arrive onetime and without any problems. Camera and lens are of quality the rest is 3rd party Chinese junk but the camera and the leneses were the deal here. For the price it is a good kit.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Renato
Reviews.Content: Definitely a great deal for those searching for a combo which has the main tools to start using a good SLR camera!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T2i Digital Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS Rebel T2i SLR Digital Camera kit is phenomenal.  It comes with everything needed to take a wide range of photographs.  The Rebel T2i is very simple to operate and the pictures are fantastic.  Sunset Electonics did a great job of packing and shipping the camera and all of the accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera, and so far I'm extremely impressed with it. It was in brand new condition as advertised and has all the features plus more that I was looking for. So far, takes great pictures. There is so much to learn, but is better than the 2 Canon Powershot cameras that I own.  The extra lenses, 32gb sdhc card, extra batteries, tripod plus other items purchased with the camera work great.  The only thing I've had to buy extra is a lager camera bag because the one that came with the kit is too small to fit all the extras. Otherwise,I'm impressed with the purchase and Sunset Electronics timely shipping of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Ótima opção para iniciantes
Reviews.Author: Wilton Villas Boas
Reviews.Content: Uma excelente câmera, com uma qualidade excepcional, tira fotos em RAW e filma em HD com uma qualidade impresionante.O Kit vem com acessórios interessantes para que está começando, mas o principal atrativo é a lente 55-250mm e as baterias extras

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T2i SLR Digital Camera Kit (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens + Canon 55-250mm IS Autofocus Lens + HDMI Cable
32GB SDHC Memory Card + Card Reader + 2 Replacement Extended Life Battries + Digital Flash
Wide Macro Lens + Telephoto Zoom Lens + Soft carrying case + Medium size tripod
Includes Cleaning kit + Screen Protector + Mini Table Top Tripod + Exclusive SSE Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T2i SLR Digital Camera Kit
